translations: n．预感：对未来事件的模糊的、不明确的预感，通常是不祥的。

sentences.sentence: She creates the atmosphere of hell by means of nightmares, illusions and presentiments, to set up an allegoric environment.
sentences.translation: 通过噩梦、幻觉、预感来营造地狱的气氛，建构一个寓言式的环境。

sentences.sentence: Presentiments are strange things! And so are sympathies; and so are signs; and the three combined make one mystery to which humanity has not yet found the key.
sentences.translation: 预感真是个奇怪的东西！感应也是，预兆也是；三者结合在一起，就组成了一个人类至今也无法解开的谜。
